description: This table contains information on provider recommendations made for a patient.  It includes data on the recommended providers and the recommending users.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROV_RECOMM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider recommended to the patient.

columns.name: PROV_RECOMM_BY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who made the provider recommendation.
